name: The Hunter's Mark
description:
A short rogue-like game, the aim is to beat the forest demon. Grind for money and buy upgrades until you can steam-roll the enemies.

Install: Unzip and run the .exe.

Credits:
Font, Created by  삼족작 samjokjak

https://www.dafont.com/levorotary.font?l[]=10&l[]=1&text=4

Music and found FX from Humble Bundle + Splice

Characters + Animations from Mixamo

All other assets created by Me.

Known Issues!
Arrows can trigger the teleport area.

Enemy bodies can slide a bit.
